pullRequest.title: fix(api) Fix tests broken by PR #599
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
My changes for #599 ended up causing some subscription related tests to fail. This PR fixes that.

commit.message: fix(api) Fix tests broken by PR #599

nodes.bodyText: Should you add return; after this line, to cede the flow of control from requestSubscription(...)?

commit.message: Move buildSubscriptionUrl to its original place

nodes.bodyText: What actually throws the ApiException? The buildConnectionRequestUrl() bit? The rest looks likes its pure OkHttp, and wouldn't throw one of our internal types.
